review_data.title: Super Service, gutes Ambiente
review_data.content: Die Hiltl Pflanzbar ist ein super Konzept. Der ausgezeichnete Service von Lucy macht das Ganze noch geniessbarer! Sehr weiterzuempfehlen!

review_data.title: Best Coffee
review_data.content: Thank you Lucie & Pflanzbar-Team for the perfect service every day at the Hiltl-Pflanzbar! - and for making my mornings better with the best cappuccinos ☺ All the best, Leandro ☺

review_data.title: Sehr empfehlenswert!
review_data.content: Sehr empfehlenswert und trotz aller Auflagen gemütlich und angenehm! Sehr freundliche und zuvorkommende Bedienung!(Lucie)More

review_data.title: Sehr gutes vegetarisches Angebot.
review_data.content: Sehr gutes vegetarisches Angebot. Selbstbedienungstheke. Bezahlt wird nach Grammzahl. Lecker und empfehlenswert. Nicht zu spät kommen.

review_data.title: quick lunch in cosy flower-Hiltl shop
review_data.content: Great location (near business area in the center of Zurich) Convenient take away if you have no time Good vegetarian food however, depending on the time of the day, the options are limited (as well as the quantities remained). Generally after 12.30 - 13.00 there...More

review_data.title: Um 13.30 Uhr alles leer
review_data.content: Mhm. Schade. Bin gerne hier. Aber das Selbstbedienungsrestaurant lebt natürlich auch davon , dass es flott gehen kann und es...More

review_data.title: old food
review_data.content: This Hiltl is located in a beautiful flower shop with a very small self serve buffet. I was there recently at 11:55 - to beat the lunch time rush, I thought - and found only what looked like leftovers, half-full trays, a very small selection,...More

review_data.title: Gesund und gut!
review_data.content: Wir kommen immer wieder gern! Es ist gut, es ist frisch, es ist gesund und die Suppen sind lecker! Preisniveau...More

review_data.title: Super !
review_data.content: Wunderschönes Ambiente, angehnem um zu verweilen. Auf jedenfall einen Besuch wert. Der Service ist super :) werde immer mit einem...More

review_data.title: Delicious vegetarian & vegan food for take-away and eat-in
review_data.content: This restaurant/take-away is located together with a flower shop which makes it a nice experience to visit. You can take-away or eat-in. Usually it is packed during lunch time but it is easiest to take-away. Delicious vegetarian and vegan food, you pay by weight.

review_data.title: Super Service, lecker Essen, fenomenal Kaffee
review_data.content: Ich war heute Morgen in der Pflanzbar mit meinem Kollegen einen Kaffee trinken. Das Ambiente hat mir sehr gut gefallen,...More

review_data.title: Great food
review_data.content: We stumbled on this place, great selection of vegetarian food in a lovely setting. The prices are relatively reasonable by Zurich standards. Unfortunately like many eateries in Zurich, the outside spaces are dominated by smokers which is a real shame

review_data.title: Vegetarian Lunch in a magical surrounding
review_data.content: This was my first encounter with Hiltl world and I keep coming back to Pflanzbar ever since I moved to Zurich. Two exceptionally pleasant and friendly girls working in the restaurant during lunch hours (Lucy and Sabrina if I remember correctly) create a wonderful atmosphere...More

review_data.title: Always great
review_data.content: I love the food, I love the ambient. Every day a choice of delicious vegetarian food and drinks. You eat surrounded by beautiful flowers. The Staff is always very welcoming, friendly and professional.

review_data.title: Gemütlich, lecker, schnell
review_data.content: Direkt in einem tollen Blumengeschäft integriert liegt die Pflanzbar von Hiltl. Tolle Deko, tolle Atmosphäre. Das Hiltl ist im Guinness...More

review_data.title: Average veggie food, great looking location.
review_data.content: I've been here a couple of weeks ago for lunch. I already had lunch at Hiltl, the oldest vegetarian restaurant in the whole world (they're in the Guinnes record book), in their shop inside Jelmoli department store. This other location looks fantastic with its flower...More

review_data.title: Nice ambient, tasty food
review_data.content: Once you enter the Pflanzbar you will experience a wonderful floral fragrance combined with scent of tasty dishes. You will eat surrounded with colorful flowers. A unique experience. A bit pricey though.

review_data.title: Flower lunch!
review_data.content: This place is amazing! It is a restaurant inside a flower shop! I have had lunch many times, I have had coffees hundred times, but i never bought any flower (although very nice, they are bloody expensive). Kitchen is run by Hiltl. So there is...More

review_data.title: Dine with Flowers
review_data.content: A unique experience in Zürich- a vegetarian restaurant in a flower shop. Choose from the delicious buffet and sit amongst the stunning Swiss flower arrangements. You cannot book here, but have an early or late lunch to avoid the crowds.

review_data.title: Totaler Flop
review_data.content: Schaute gestern Abend kurz in der Pflanzbar vorbei, weil sie doch von draussen durch das Schaufenster so verlockend aussieht. Einmal...More

review_data.title: Speisen im Garten Eden
review_data.content: Super Angebot und leckere Speisen. Das Personal ist freundlich und Blumen kann man auch gleich noch nach Hause bringen. Super...More

review_data.title: Versüsste Mittagspause
review_data.content: Gestern war ich geschäftlich unterwegs und der morgendliche Kundentermin war nicht sonderlich zufriedenstellend. Spontan habe ich mich entschieden meine Mittagspause...More

review_data.title: mala atención
review_data.content: gente muy rara .... y son vegetarianos .. es self service.... not recomendable... es un vivero no les interesan los...More

review_data.title: Hiltl Buffet im Dschungel
review_data.content: Tolle Auswahl vom Hiltl Buffet in wunderschöner Atmosphäre! Man sitzt inmitten der Pflanzen in einer kleinen Oase. Man kann nicht...More

review_data.title: originale
review_data.content: sono stata al Pflanzbar con degli amici per un evento e devo dire che la location é fantastica, abbiamo cenato...More

review_data.title: Healthy food in a green environment
review_data.content: I go to the Pflanzbar once or twice a week and always thoroughly enjoy my meals (takeaway or in the restaurant). The Pflanzbar is located in a flower shop and you can eat your vegetarian meal prepared by the Hiltl Restaurant right amongst the flowers.

review_data.title: Fancy a beverage within the floral jungle?
review_data.content: The Pflanz Bar Zurich is actually a café/bar within a beautiful & fragrant floral shop. The inside seating consists of high stools near the bar and within the floral shop and low tables with padded seats. There are sidewalk tables where you are surrounded by...More

review_data.title: Günstiger und guter Kaffe im Grünen
review_data.content: Ein Arbeitskollege hat mir diese neue Bar gezeigt. Von aussen nimmt man die Bar kaum wahr, da sie in einem...More

review_data.title: Botanische Flucht aus dem Bueroalltag
review_data.content: Ein Mitarbeiter nahm mich fuer einen Espresso mit in die PflanzBar. Der Kaffee ist fuer Zuercher Verhaeltnisse preiswert, d.h. einen...More
